name: Deathly Dungeons
description:
Deathly Dungeons -  by OddLabs.io

Embark on a thrilling adventure and become the ultimate dungeon champion in this action-packed game! Choose your champion from a diverse range of heroes and get ready to battle hordes of ferocious monsters. Explore challenging dungeons filled with danger and excitement, and collect valuable loot along the way.

As you progress through the game, your hero will face increasingly difficult challenges, but with every victory, you'll gain experience and level up, unlocking new abilities and upgrades. Keep an eye out for powerful Dungeon Bosses - formidable foes that guard their domains with deadly force. Defeat them to earn rare treasures and gain valuable experience.

But be warned - the path to becoming a legendary dungeon champion is not an easy one. You'll need to use all your skills and wits to survive the relentless onslaught of monsters and emerge victorious. So gather your courage, hone your abilities, and take on the challenge of the dungeon!

  • Four Challenging Dungeons & Bosses
  • Artisan Shop & Player Upgrades
  • Endless Mode Campaigns
  • Quests & Achievements
  • Epic Weapon Unlocks
  • Dungeon & Adventure Theme
  • Survival/Bullet-Hell Gameplay
  • Move: W, A, S, D
  • Fire Weapon: Mouse

Boss Dungeons:

Destroy all the enemy monsters to summon the Dungeon Boss! Complete all the Boss levels to unlock Endless Mode & Quests.
